Noticed online that they have a significant manufacturing presence in North Carolina, Wisconsin and Mexico. Also a bit in Europe.
All I know is they CONSTANTLY get bailed out by the taxpayers.... If they were so great why is all the corporate WELFARE so necessary every few years?
